Class AlienUnit

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.shipcard.ShipCard
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.shipcard.AlienUnit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AlienUnit extends ShipCard
Represents an AlienUnit, a special type of ShipCard

An AlienUnit can be either BROWN or PURPLE and has a presence state that determines if the alien is present

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • AlienUnit

      public AlienUnit(String id, ShipCard.Connector topConnector, ShipCard.Connector rightConnector, ShipCard.Connector bottomConnector, ShipCard.Connector leftConnector, AlienUnit.Type type)
      Constructs an AlienUnit with specified connectors and type. Initially, the presence of the alien is set to false
      Parameters:
      topConnector - The connector on the top side
      rightConnector - The connector on the right side
      bottomConnector - The connector on the bottom side
      leftConnector - The connector on the left side
      type - The type of the Alien Unit (BROWN or PURPLE)

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public AlienUnit.Type getType()
      Returns:
      The type of the Alien Unit (BROWN or PURPLE)

    • getPresence

      public boolean getPresence()
      Returns:
      The presence of the alien, true if the alien is present, false otherwise

    • connectUnit

      public void connectUnit()
      Finalize the connection of the alien unit to a housing unit, setting the presence of the alien to true

    • isPresent

      public boolean isPresent()
      Returns:
      True if the alien is present, false otherwise

    • killAlien

      public void killAlien()
      Kills the alien, setting its presence to false
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the alien is already dead

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this AlienUnit to another object for equality

      Two AlienUnits are considered equal if they are of the same class, pass the equality check of the superclass, and have the same type and presence attributes

      Overrides:
      equals in class ShipCard
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare with this AlienUnit
      Returns:
      true if the given object is an AlienUnit with the same attributes, false otherwise

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Returns a hash code for this alien unit, consistent with equals(Object).
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class ShipCard
      Returns:
      a hash code based on the alien's base properties, type, and presence state
